thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 02 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-China Minsheng Drawin Technology Announces Framework Agreement with China Minsheng Drawin Construction Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Minsheng Drawin Technology Announces Framework Agreement with China Minsheng Drawin Construction Co

organizations.name: china minsheng drawin technology group ltd

text:
May 2 (Reuters) - China Minsheng Drawin Technology Group Ltd :
* CO, CMDC ENTERED INTO FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT FOR PROVISION OF EPC GENERAL CONTRACTING SERVICES BY CMDC GROUP TO GROUP
* ESTIMATES MAXIMUM VALUE OF TRANSACTIONS UNDER FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT MAY REACH RMB400 MILLION
* CO, CMDC ENTERS FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT FOR SUPPLY OF PREFABRICATED CONSTRUCTION COMPONENTS, PRODUCTS TO CMDC GROUP BY CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
